text: Digau Levi ala go digau hai daahili aanei mai di madahaanau o Asaph guu noho i nadau lohongo ala ne hagaingoo ginai be nia helekai King David: Asaph, Heman, mo Jeduthun, soukohp di king. Digau hagaloohi ala i nia bontai di Hale Daumaha hagalee hai gi hagatanga gi daha mo nadau gowaa ngalua, idimaa digau Levi ala i golo gu hagatogomaalia Pasoobaa gi digaula.
